channel.title: Hugo Forum Topic #40998 on A handful of dust
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo Forum Topic #40998 on A handful of dust

item.title: PDF Means and Moment Generating Functions
item.description: This is a post to test out my new setup with hugo. I was not very happy with my setup in wordpress owing to lack of flexibility in writing equations. And when it wanted me to pay for it, I sort of gave up on the platform. Suffice it to say that that is the reason for the considerable delay in posting. This time, we look at some very simple ideas concerning probability distributions.
